oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement from Nashville City Directory, 1871
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A page of advertisement from the 1871 Nashville City Directory featuring 1) Thomas L. Dodd, attorney and solicitor in Chancery at Law, Office no. 9, Cedar Street; 2) Wm. Stockell & Son, located at no. 88 Broad Street; and 3) Florence Sewing Machines, with Mrs. E.A. Nelson & Sister, Agents, 125 Church Street in downtown Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of Nashville City Directory Collection, Metro Archives. 1 digital image.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dodd, Thomas L.
William Stockell & Son (Nashville, Tenn.); Florence Sewing Machines (Nashville, Tenn.)
